name: Lost God
description: Experience atmospheric exploration gameplay on your journey through several breathtaking areas, from a vibrant forest to overgrown ruins and dark tunnels. Secrets await around every corner, waiting to be unearthed.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Dual Core CPU 2.0 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 750ti DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 (64 bit), Windows 10 (64 bit) Processor: Quad Core CPU 2.5 GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 950 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 4 GB available space
